quote_first: The phone on his desk rang, startling him. It was
quote_last: . He hadn’t realized he had been sitting as if in a fugue.
title: The Lighthouse
author: P.D. James

quote_last: Aargh. Suddenly main menu is on TV saying “Press 6.” Oh dear. Realize was using telly remote control by mistake. Now news has come on.
title: Bridget Jones's Diary
author: Helen Fielding
